# SAGE DO - AI-Powered Services Platform
# https://sagedo.in

## About SAGE DO
SAGE DO is an AI-powered service platform helping startups, professionals, and businesses with daily tasks. We combine AI technology with human expertise to deliver high-quality results quickly and affordably.

**Tagline:** "We do your daily grind, you do grand things."

**Founded:** 2024
**Location:** India
**Contact:** hello@sagedo.in | +91 6284925684 (WhatsApp)

---

## Key Features
- 38+ services across 4 categories
- AI + Human expertise combination
- 24-48 hour delivery on most services
- Free ₹150 welcome bonus on signup
- Starter Credit for first free service
- Token-based rewards system

---

## Service Categories

### BUSINESS (12 services)
Services for startups, entrepreneurs, and businesses:
- Content Writing & Ad Copy - ₹199
- Marketing Email Template - ₹299
- Brand Name Ideas (5 Options) - ₹399
- SEO Blog Article (1500 words) - ₹799
- Landing Page Blueprint - ₹999
- Ad Copy Package (5 Pieces) - ₹799
- AI Business Consultation Call - ₹1,499
- Data Solutions & Dashboards - ₹1,999
- Marketing Visual Content - ₹599
- Complete Website (5 Pages) - ₹7,999
- Business Automation Setup - ₹12,999
- Complete Branding Package - ₹14,999

Services for rapid MVP execution:
- MVP Development (Complete) - ₹50,000+
- Landing Page & Funnel - ₹15,000
- Custom Web Application - ₹30,000
- UI/UX Wireframing - ₹8,000

---

## How It Works
1. Submit Your Problem - Describe your challenge in plain English or Hindi
2. AI Analysis - Our system instantly analyzes and finds the best solution
3. Receive Your Answer - Get a clear, actionable solution delivered to you

---

## Pricing
- Individual services starting from ₹149
- Pay-as-you-go model
- Token system for savings (earn tokens, use for discounts)
- Free Starter Credit for first service
- All prices in Indian Rupees (₹)

---

## Target Audience
- Startup Founders
- Working professionals
- Freelancers
- Small business owners
- Content creators
- Entrepreneurs

---

## Trust & Security
- 150+ happy customers with 4.8/5 rating
- 24-48 hour delivery on most services
- Revision rounds included with every service
- Secure payments via Razorpay (RBI-approved, PCI-DSS compliant)
- 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - free revisions until you're happy
- Full refund within 7 days if work is not delivered or has major issues
- Data Privacy - your files and personal information are encrypted and never shared
- 24/7 Support via WhatsApp, email, or in-app chat

## Why Choose SAGE DO?
- AI + Human: We combine AI speed with human quality checks
- Affordable: Services starting from just ₹149 - designed for Indian budgets
- Fast Delivery: Most work delivered in 24-48 hours
- Free First Service: Try us with your Starter Credit - no risk
- Hindi & English: Submit your requirements in Hindi or English
- Made in India: Built by Indians for Indians

---

## Refund Policy
- Not satisfied? Get free revisions until you're happy
- Work not delivered? Full refund within 7 days
- Major issues with quality? Full refund within 7 days
- Contact support via WhatsApp for quick resolution

## Technical Information
- Website: https://sagedo.in
- Platform: React web application
- Backend: Node.js
- Payments: Razorpay (RBI-approved)
- Hosting: Render.com
